title: FSIS Issues Public Health Alert for Ineligible Frozen Siluriformes Products Imported from the People’s Republic of China
summary: Chinese Translation: Simplified Chinese (5/06/2024) WASHINGTON, March. 21, 2024 – The U.S. Department of Agriculture’s Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) is issuing a public health alert for imported frozen Siluriformes products that were illegally imported from the People’s Republic of China and are ineligible...
impacted_products: •	12-oz. (340 g) plastic packages containing “FROZEN STRIPED PANGASIUS MAWS.”
